package.name: Honey
package.shortDescription: Apple Watch interface for all devices.

descriptionlist.description:
Honey includes 2 different icon styles and 3 background blur styles. Each icon automatically animates as you scroll, mimicking an Apple Watch animation.
Honey Features: Quick access to all your applications. Beautiful watchOS animation. Different styles of blur background. Tactile feedback when launching applications. Possibility to enable / disable the dock menu. Compatible with themes, XenHTML widgets, and notification tweaks.
